CodeList.Name: Microbiology Susceptibility Test Name

Description.TranslatedText: Terminology relevant to the test names that define microorganism responses to antimicrobial agents.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An indication of reduced or increased susceptibility of a microbial organism, or activity of a biological/biochemical reaction in response to the inhibitory concentration (IC50 and/or IC95) of a specific drug.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: Microbial EC50 Fold Change from Baseline
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Microbial EC50 Fold Change from Baseline
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A fold change based on the concentration of a specific drug expected to produce 50 percent inhibition of population growth or replication of a microbial organism. (NCI)
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Microbial EC50 Fold Change from Baseline

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: Microbial EC50 Fold Change from Ref
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Microbial EC50 Fold Change from Ref
Microbial EC50 Fold Change from Reference
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A fold change based on the concentration of a specific drug expected to produce 50 percent inhibition of the population growth or replication of a microbial organism. It is a ratio calculated by the EC50 Subject Result divided by the EC50 Reference Control Result. (NCI)
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Microbial EC50 Fold Change from Reference

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A reference control sample response based on the concentration of a specific drug expected to produce 50 percent inhibition of the population growth or replication of a microbial organism. (NCI)

A measurement of titer of a microbial organism that has been exposed to the concentration of a specific drug expected to produce 50 percent inhibition of the population growth or replication of a microbial organism. (NCI)

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: Microbial IC50 Fold Change from Baseline
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Microbial IC50 Fold Change from Baseline
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A fold change based on the concentration of a specific drug expected to produce 50 percent inhibition on the enzymatic activity of a microbial organism. It is a ratio calculated by the current IC50 Subject Result divided by the IC50 Subject Result from the baseline visit.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Microbial IC50 Fold Change from Baseline

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: Microbial IC50 Fold Change from Ref
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Microbial IC50 Fold Change from Ref
Microbial IC50 Fold Change from Reference
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A fold change based on the concentration of a specific drug expected to produce 50 percent inhibition on the enzymatic activity of a microbial organism. It is a ratio calculated by the IC50 Subject Result divided by the IC50 Reference Control Result.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Microbial IC50 Fold Change from Reference

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A reference control sample response based on the concentration of a specific drug expected to produce 50 percent inhibition on the enzymatic activity of a microbial organism.

A measurement of biological/biochemical reaction of a microbial organism that has been exposed to the concentration of a specific drug expected to produce 50 percent inhibition on the enzymatic activity of a microbial organism.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: Microbial IC95 Fold Change from Baseline
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Microbial IC95 Fold Change from Baseline
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A fold change based on the concentration of a specific drug expected to produce 95 percent inhibition on the enzymatic activity of a microbial organism. It is a ratio calculated by the current IC95 Subject Result divided by the IC95 Subject Result from the baseline visit.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Microbial IC95 Fold Change from Baseline

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: Microbial IC95 Fold Change from Ref
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Microbial IC95 Fold Change from Ref
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A fold change based on the concentration of a specific drug expected to produce 95 percent inhibition on the enzymatic activity of a microbial organism. It is a ratio calculated by the IC95 Subject Result divided by the IC95 Reference Control Result.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Microbial IC95 Fold Change from Ref

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A reference control sample response based on the concentration of a specific drug expected to produce 95 percent inhibition on the enzymatic activity of a microbial organism.

A measurement of biological/biochemical reaction of a microbial organism that has been exposed to the concentration of a specific drug expected to produce 95 percent inhibition on the enzymatic activity of a microbial organism.
A measurement of the response of the microbial organism to a controlled concentration of an antimicrobial agent.
A measurement that specifies the minimum concentration of the agent at which organism growth was inhibited.

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Microbiology Susceptibility Test Name Terminology
